This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Should focus on scroller across shadow boundaries depending on delegatesFocus value.
  assert_equals: Focus should move forward from host-no-delegates-focus/A to host-no-delegates-focus-2 expected Element node <div id="host-no-delegates-focus-2" class="scroll">\n  \n  ... but got Element node <button id="B">BUTTON B</button>
